name: Life Of Chest
description:
Be a living Chest who helps the heroes to conquer the dungeon!

Gather precious treasures and keys to offer them to your hero.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot Coins: Left Mouse Button

UI: Left(red hearts) shows health and items of the chest.

     Right side (blue hearts) shows health and items of the hero.

HINTS: - Consider carefully when you pick up coins: The hero will take all your coins when you offer to him! 

Consider picking coins AFTER offering to the hero.

-Keep an Eye on the Hero's health (blue hearts). If he's dead, the game is over.
